summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements with a comprehensive story platform featuring backend data models, API functions, AI-generated sample stories, frontend browsing/creation interfaces, text-to-speech integration, and warm literary-themed design. All seven genres are supported with appropriate UI and backend logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration with login/logout functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication or user profiles' as a non-goal, yet the implementation includes useInternetIdentity hook and InternetIdentityProvider with full authentication flow

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode support with comprehensive dark theme color palette
hallucinated_features.reason: Dark mode theming is not mentioned in requirements or acceptance criteria. The design requirement (REQ-7) specifies warm, inviting colors and literary atmosphere but does not request dark mode variants
